item.title: Connecting Notes & Bidirectional Linking
item.description: One of the most powerful features of an app like Obsidian is the ability to make connections between the notes that are in your library.

item.title: Intro to Personal Knowledge Management
item.description: Personal Knowledge Management systems (or PKMs) are all the rage lately. Collecting and connecting information from bookmarks and blog posts in a sort of “personal wiki” using tools like Roam Research and Obsidian can help you see your ideas from different perspectives.
